EmailTemplate.name: Coffs Harbour 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: COFFS HARBOUR EVENT - See how QuickBooks Online can help grow your practice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit
Join us for an introductory event to learn how QuickBooks Online and Quickbooks Online Accountant can help you grow and run your practice more efficiently.
Agenda
• Benefits of partnering with the No. 1 global cloud accounting solution • Latest feature demonstration including payments, inventory, attachments and the mobile app • Hear what enhancements are in the pipeline • See how to run payroll efficiently and accurately • Get an overview of the various apps you can connect to QuickBooks Online • Hear how a local accounting firm has adopted QuickBooks Online • Learn hints and tips from QuickBooks Online expert, Alee Cochrane • Q & A time plus general networking
Food and drinks will be provided.
Where and When
Venue: Opal Cove Resort Opal Boulevard, Coffs Harbour NSW 2450 Plenty of parking is available. Date: Thursday, 28th January 2016 Time: 5:00 - 7:30pm
We look forward to meeting you on the day.
Intuit Australia
Level 34, 1 O'Connell Street, Sydney, NSW 2000 intuit.com.au
You are receiving this email as you have logged your details and made contact with Intuit before.
